nodes.bodyText: Lets avoid static import, if possible.
Same here, and other such cases.

This is somewhat confusing to read - why does setup() call something named validate(), instead of setting up the cluster? One has to go to inside validate() to figure out what is going.
Perhaps it can be named setupClusterAndValidate(), or something more readable?
old not a great name :-(. Perhaps name according to what characteristic classifies the test to be in one suite over the other? Same with the name of xml file (testng-old-test.xml).

nodes.bodyText:
Renamed to:
testng-statefull.xml for test cases that use shared state.
testng-stateless.xml for testcases that create and destroy their own state.

nodes.bodyText: Some comment on why this upgrade was need would be good.

I modified pinot-controller.pom to configure the two test suites under pinot-controller. After this, mvn test would lead to all pinot-controller test cases running twice. Changing configuration settings did not seem to be working, so I tried upgrading to latest version (3.0.0-M5) and that fixed the problem. It seems like the earlier version has a bug that causes testsuites to run twice.
Thanks, please add it in the description of the PR, as well as a short description in the pom file itself (can link to the PR description).
